Ralph Welborn

Ralph Welborn is a vetren executive, business seeker and the author of Get It Done, about briding the gap between stratigic objective/ Intent and everyday execution and The Jericho Principle, focuses on how to drive alignment both inside and outside of an organization to drive innovation and new sources of value.
